actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses and to repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to such deduction and the extension of the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance.

summary.text: College Tuition Relief Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code and the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to make permanent the: (1) deduction for qualified tuition and expenses; and (2) exclusion from gross income of employer provided educational assistance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the deduction for qualified tuition and related expenses and to repeal the sunset of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 with respect to such deduction and the extension of the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance.
